general.name: star1d
general.description: Each star1d file contains the processed 1D stellar spectra and associated data for a single plate configuration.
general.generated_by: migration: not in database. Needs update

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

FCJD.name: FCJD
FCJD.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

STARNAME.name: STARNAME
STARNAME.description:
TYC Name, GCS Name, HIP
    Name, 2MASS Name
STARNAME.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

ORDER.name: ORDER
ORDER.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

ORIG_FILENAME.name: ORIG_FILENAME
ORIG_FILENAME.description:
Filename of the
    original raw image.
ORIG_FILENAME.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FLUX_1D_NORM.name: FLUX_1D_NORM
FLUX_1D_NORM.description:
1-dimensional
    continuum removed normalized stellar spectra. Processed through University
    of Florida 1D Pipeline.
FLUX_1D_NORM.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FLUX_1D_ORIG.name: FLUX_1D_ORIG
FLUX_1D_ORIG.description:
1-dimensional
    non-normalized stellar spectra. Spectra have been bias subtracted and
    trace/deslanted/cosmic ray removed.

PHOTONERROR.name: PHOTONERROR
PHOTONERROR.description:
Photon limit of
    observation based on combined photon limits in the stellar spectra and
    corresponding Tio spectra used for calibration.

STATERROR.name: STATERROR
STATERROR.description:
Observed precision in the
    measurement of the Radial Velocity (RV) datapoint. (Each final RV value is the mean of the RV
    found in 34 boxes that a spectra is divided into; the satistical
    variance of these 34 values is used to estimate the quality of the
    measurement. It reflects the precision of the measurement, but not the
    actual accuracy since a systematic offset can create large error while
    maintaining consistent results across the boxes in the spectra.)

REJECT.name: REJECT
REJECT.description:
A value of 1 means the spectra
    was good. A NaN means it was rejected for a given reason (dead fiber,
    misplug, etc).
REJECT.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

WLSOLN.name: WLSOLN
WLSOLN.description:
Wavelength
    solution for stellar spectra as a function of pixel number, corrected for
    barycentric motion. Produced from University of Florida 1D Pipeline.
